channel.title: Help cw server
channel.description:
yes CastleWars server, not a mad server called cw
i wanted to make a training place at cw so people can train there, bank there and shop there
i need help with it cus my server doesnt have ::coordson (:() Help me plz with npc placing an coords
and objectplacing of course (i tried to make with leftclick object then use that coords and expiriment with it, but it isnt cery well (a npc in front of portal , object over object , object in npc , ...)
so help meh plz, and help me also with the begin spawning point so thew spawn in the castle (begin of cw)[br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2007, 01:25:43 PM[/size][hr]oh i allready know the startspawn i think but not diespawn

item.title: Help cw server
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

The death coordinates can be changed in client.java, for making a shop you have to use client.java, autospawn.cfg, and shop.cfg Then for coordinates, that will be placed in autospawn.cfg along with the npc id, and if you want it to move too. For the command coordson just add it, or simply press “F4” in-game and it shows your x and y coordinates at the bottom right hand corner. And for objects…just add the method for it, and add the object. There you go, hopefully I explained alot more for you.

Read full topic
